Transform vector to (a,b)

Source: R/transform_alpha.R
transform_alpha.Rd

Transform vector to (a,b)

Usage

transform_alpha(x, a = 0, b = 1)

Arguments

x

vector to transform

a

lower bound of transform

b

upper bound of transform

Value

transformed vector

Examples

transform_alpha(runif(100))
#>   [1] 0.993785544 0.945016025 0.636866461 0.260343558 0.083809210 0.596551561
